letter.body: I am writing to inform you...

telegram.body: Telegrams really cool. Watch out for Gremlins.

wanted_poster.name: Thomas 'Black Jack' Ketchum
wanted_poster.details: $5,000.00 for the capture dead or alive of the men who robbed the Atchison Topeka and Santa Fe train near Deming, NM.
wanted_poster.description: Believed to be Thomas 'Black Jack' Ketchum and his band.  These men are desperate and dangerous.

book.clue: Whilst flicking through this book, you realise... Reading is it's own reward!
